name: Star Valkyrie Rising
description:
Welcome to Bifrost City! Ten years separate us from our last vision of the Defenders of Truth, Love, and Justice! The four legendary heroines, the Star Valkyries, no longer grace the city with their benevolent presence, but some say the four heroines will one day return!

Now, those four bright warriors sludge through the day to day of teaching high school- until one day the school undertakes a new threat! Can these four teachers remember their ways as Star Valkyries to keep their students safe from mythical foes? There is only one way to find out!

Star Valkyries is a strategy RPG with some puzzle elements.

It features:

-A full chapter of the game and an introduction to our Valkyries!

-An equipment based skill system with a myriad of combinations!

-An exciting story built around the power of forgiveness and responsibility of our own actions and beliefs!

(Star Valkyries does not belief in stealing your parent's credit cards, which is why this game is free!)
